not_found.version_showing_main: Version not found, showing main version

disk_full.title: Disk Full
disk_full.message: Unable to complete the operation. Free up disk space and try again.
disk_full.additionalInfo: Check available disk space and remove unnecessary files.

corrupt.title: Database Corrupted
corrupt.message: The database is corrupted and cannot be accessed.
corrupt.additionalInfo: Please contact technical support for assistance.

locked.title: Database Locked
locked.message: The database is being used by another process.
locked.additionalInfo: Please try again in a few moments.

generic.title: Database Error
generic.message: An unexpected error occurred while accessing the database.
generic.additionalInfo: If the problem persists, please contact support.
